snippet: The Giants are part of the trend of N.F.L. teams holding training camp at home at their permanent facilities rather than on a remote campus, but either location has its pros and cons.
abstract: New York Giants join several other NFL teams in holding their training camp at home, breaking with 80-year-old tradition in which team gather at remote location in spirit of summer camp camaraderie; choice comes with both pros and cons, but complex in East Rutherford, NJ, features undeniably superior facilities.
lead_paragraph: The Giants are part of the trend of N.F.L. teams holding training camp at home at their permanent facilities rather than on a remote campus, but either location has its pros and cons.

headline.main: Giants Stay Home for Summer Camp
headline.print_headline: Giants Stay Home for Summer Camp
